thread.section_title: Dresslink 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslink 的点评意见 | dresslink.com
thread.title: Kat Astrophic Marasigan
thread.title_full: Dresslink 的点评人 Kat Astrophic Marasigan

author: Kat Astrophic Marasigan
title: Kat Astrophic Marasigan
text: I ordered 4 items from the website. Im not expecting much since it's all cheap and the sizes are different and whatnot, but I'm upset that unfortunately my order is one of those ones that never come. This is the last day my package is supposidly going to come on but I don't have much hope. There goes 40 bucks. I suppose that's what you get for being cheap. If you reply dresslink my order number is #DLNI3844W .
